name: site-ci-tools
description: Installing NPM tools for CI tasks, reproduced locally.

scripts.lint-md: for f in $(find "$PWD" -not -path "*/node_modules/*" | grep '\S\.md$'); do ./node_modules/.bin/markdownlint "$f"; done && for f in $(find "$PWD" -not -path "*/node_modules/*" | grep '\S\.markdown$'); do ./node_modules/.bin/markdownlint "$f"; done && echo Success! || echo "ERROR: Exited with code $?"
scripts.lint-html: echo "Validating HTML..." && cd docs/ && htmlproofer ./_site --only-4xx --check-favicon --check-html && echo Success! || echo "ERROR: Exited with code $?"
scripts.lint-css: echo "Validating CSS..." && echo Success! || echo "ERROR: Exited with code $?"
scripts.lint-js: echo "Validating JS and JSX..." && ./node_modules/.bin/eslint --env browser docs/ && echo Success! || echo "ERROR: Exited with code $?"

author: Joseph Hall (@groundh0g)
